Articles.Content: So anyone have any thoughts on whats going to happen in tonights episode?
Angels in New York. I can foresee the angels being able to turn statues into angels- in which case, there's gonna be one heck of a big one!
Yeah I thought about that when the episode list was released wonder if this is the episode where Rory and Amy leave

Angels in New York. I can foresee the angels being able to turn statues into angels- in which case, there's gonna be one heck of a big one!

Doctor who you gonna call?

Woo! The angels have gone away from killing people!

Personally I found the non-killing part scariest... Being lost somewhere in time would be hell... :S
wow a dr.who thread on kspforums i must be dreaming
I just cried in a fetal position ;_; that was so sad great episode really scary

Hmm... Well... That series really didn't tie together...

Except the first episode...
Plot? What? Am I the only one that watches this show just for Karen Gillan?! I am certainly kind of upset at the implications going on in tonights episode.
Atleast the new companion Jenna Louise Colman is just as nice looking

Hmm... Angel statues.

Rory and amy leave.

statues attempt to take over earth

doctor somehow stops them.

there lol.
Noooo I just watched the episode, that ending was just so cruel ;_;

I watched the episode again because step mum turned it over to watch X factor on ITV 2 >_>

And oh my god T_T

Shortest series in the history of doctor who!

I watched the episode again because step mum turned it over to watch X factor on ITV 2 >_>

And oh my god T_T

Shortest series in the history of doctor who!

I believe they've taken what I would refer to as the "American system". Where you have a shorter series but two within a year... Which really sucks...

Hope Doctor who never becomes americanized like what they did to Torchwood that was amazing but when starz bought it it turned into a government conspiracy drama I would give last nights episode a 8/10 reason why its not 10/10 it was just went too fast plus they didn't really explain why no one saw the giant statue of liberty standing right beside the building
